amendatorysection.para: The examining board shall elect from its membership at its annual meeting, officers for the coming year. The officers shall be a chairperson and a vice-chairperson. The duties of the chairperson shall be to preside at all meetings of the examining board. The vice-chairperson shall preside in the absence of the chairperson and shall, with the other officers, fulfill such other duties and obligations as provided in section 81-8,110.07 and the bylaws.
